### Power Generation System (Under Construction)
Latest attempt consists of:
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) containing 47 coal
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups attempting to create water connection
Currently not functioning due to incomplete setup and connection issues

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing steam engines, ensure there is sufficient clear space considering the entity's tile dimensions (3x5 tiles)
- Check for existing objects or entities before attempting placement
- Consider the orientation and connection points when placing power system components

### Power System Connection Issues
- Remove all existing pipe groups before creating new connections to avoid conflicts
- Create a single, direct water connection path instead of multiple branching paths
- Ensure proper spacing between power components for connection points to align
- Plan the complete path before placing pipes to avoid creating dead ends or blocked routes

### Resource Management
- Mining drills and furnaces need constant fuel supply to operate
- Ensure proper spacing between mining drills and their target furnaces
- Maintain fuel levels in all burner devices to prevent operation interruption

### Power Distribution
- Electric poles must be properly connected to form a complete power network
- Ensure power consumers (like labs) are within range of electric poles

### Pipe System Management
- Implement systematic pipe removal before attempting new connections
- Create minimal, direct pipe connections to reduce complexity
- Verify fluid system connections are complete and unobstructed
- Ensure proper orientation of components relative to pipe connections
